english_example_sentence: The child made his mother happy by bringing her a beautiful flower.
russian_example_sentence: Ребенок осчастливил свою мать, принеся ей красивый цветок.
turkish_example_sentence: Çocuk, annesine güzel bir çiçek getirerek onu mutlu etti.
